basic.name: El'druin's Might (Q)
basic.description: Throw El'druin to the target area, dealing 110 damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. It can be reactivated within 5 seconds to teleport Tyrael to El'druin and Slow nearby enemies again.

basic.name: Righteousness (W)
basic.description: Shields Tyrael for 336 damage and nearby allied Heroes and Minions for 40% as much for 4 seconds.

basic.name: Smite (E)
basic.description: Rake target area for 150 damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

heroic.name: Judgment (R)
heroic.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero, dealing 150 damage and Stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 damage.

heroic.name: Sanctification (R)
heroic.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

trait.name: Archangel's Wrath (T)
trait.description: Upon dying, become Invulnerable and gain 20% Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Upon expiration, explode, dealing 450 damage and reducing Tyrael's death timer by 10% per enemy Hero hit.Archangel's Wrath reduces nearby enemy Heroes' damage by 50% while active and for 3 seconds when it expires.

1.name: Salvation
1.description: Increase the Shield amount Tyrael gains from Righteousness by 40% and heal Tyrael for 140 Health if his Shield is destroyed. Does not increase the Shield amount gained by allies.

1.name: Justice for All
1.description: Increase the Shield applied to allies by Righteousness to 80% of the Shield gained by Tyrael.

1.name: Ardent Restoration
1.description: Dealing damage to a Hero heals Tyrael for 20 Health over 5 seconds. Dealing damage resets this timer, and the heal amount stacks up to 10 times.Quest: Every Regeneration Globe gathered increases this heal amount by 1%.

4.name: Stalwart Angel
4.description: Gain 25 Armor while El'druin's Might is active, and for 3 seconds after teleporting.

4.name: Bound by Law
4.description: Heroes hit by El'druin's Might heal Tyrael for 3% of his maximum Health. Tyrael's Basic Attacks against enemies Slowed by El'druin's Might increase the Slow duration by 1 second, up to 4 seconds.

4.name: Divine Vigor
4.description: If Smite hits an enemy, Tyrael's Basic Attacks within the next 4 seconds heal for 70% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Reciprocate
7.description: When Tyrael's Shield from Righteousness expires or is destroyed, it deals 190 damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Purge Evil
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite increases Tyrael's Basic Attack damage by 60% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Swift Retribution
7.description: Smite grants 20% more Movement Speed and also grants 25% Attack Speed for 2 seconds.

10.name: Judgment
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero, dealing 150 damage and Stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 damage.

10.name: Sanctification
10.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

13.name: Sword of Justice
13.description: Upon teleporting using El'druin's Might, El'druin swaps places with Tyrael, and El'druin's Might can be reactivated to teleport an additional time.

13.name: Holy Ground
13.description: Create a ring for 3 seconds that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'druin's Might.

13.name: Law and Order
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite reduces the cooldown of Righteousness by 1 second. Each allied Hero Shielded by Righteousness increases the damage of the next Smite by 35%.

16.name: Horadric Reforging
16.description: Tyrael's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of El'druin's Might by 2 seconds.

16.name: Burning Halo
16.description: Both Tyrael and El'druin deal 18 damage per second to nearby enemies. Teleporting increases this damage from Tyrael by 150% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Smite the Wicked
16.description: While El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting, Smite's cooldown recharges 125% faster.

20.name: Angel of Justice
20.description: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.

20.name: Holy Arena
20.description: Increase the duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increase the damage of allies inside by 25%.

20.name: Seal of El'druin
20.description: Using a Basic Ability grants 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

20.name: Defense of the Angels
20.description: Activate to gain 50 Armor for 3 seconds.Each time Tyrael damages an enemy Hero with a Basic Attack or Basic Ability, increase the duration of this Armor bonus by 0.5 seconds.
